titleStmt.title: The general doctrine of equation reduced into brief precepts. In III chapters. derived from the works of the best modern analysts. / By Michael Dary, Philomath.
titleStmt.author: Dary, Michael.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Nath. Brook at the Angel in Cornhill.

notesStmt.note: Printer's device facing t.p.: Angel with quill, flanked by inits. NB.
Imperfect: tightly bound, and with print show-through, and loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
